note.p: Anglo-Catholic cleric and mission leader. BA, Cambridge (Peterhouse), 1856. Ordained priest, 1857. Curate, Weston Market, 1856–7; Christ Church Westminster, 1857–60; Haggerston mission, 1860; Livingston, Sussex, 1861–3; St Peter’s Plymouth, 1866–7; St Paul’s, Knightsbridge, 1867–74. Chaplain to the Earl of Kinnoul, 1870. Vicar, Lavender Hill, London, 1874–85; rector, Weston Market, Suffolk, from 1885. Author of Mission sermons (1864).
